phrs.translation: 租船人, 承租人, 转租人, 租船者
转租人, 转租合同承租人, 租家
租船人付税, 租船人支付费用
期租人, 期租承租人

sentences.sentence: The charterer or a named agent for or on behalf of the charterer.
sentences.translation: 租船主或租船主的具名代理或代表。

sentences.sentence: The shipowner shall be liable for compensation for any losses suffered by the charterer thereby.
sentences.translation: 致使承租人遭受损失的，出租人应当负赔偿责任。

sentences.sentence: Any signature by an agent must indicate whether the agent has signed for or on behalf of the master, owner or charterer.
sentences.translation: 代理的签字必须显示其是否作为船长、船东或租船主的代理或代表签署提单。
